title: (x) Puremagick Decorative Type Font - Pussycat from Fontalicious {Lex, Chris K}
content:
Anyone know this font by chance?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100303140857im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puremagick%20font_4559.jpg)
author: Yorkinmomma

comments.content:
Bump.

I'd like to know what this is also. I thought it looked more like one of Ray Larabie's fonts, but having looked at all of them, no match. It sure does look familiar, though.

A bit like [Los Alamos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100303140857/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/los-alamos/), but no cigar. I am searching for unicase fonts.

- Mike Yanega
I searched for unicase, star over the i, and both, and came up short. I hope you have more success than I did, Mike. Thanks for looking. BTW, Mike, package on the way soon.

Also found [Super Duty](http://web.archive.org/web/20100303140857/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=TYT0000060#flont) at Veer, which might not be far off if you wanted to add some stems and a few other minor tweaks.

_package on the way soon_?

Thank you, in advance. What is it, Steve?

- Mike Yanega

It is from Fontalicious - It's called "Pussycat" and can be found at the link Chris posted.

- Lex

P.S. The star tittle is only on the uppercase 'I'.

- Lex
Kudos to all: Chris for having the answer right out of the box, Mike for his efforts, and Lex for pinpointing the exact font.
